Anderlecht has introduced its new Joma third kit for the 2024-2025 season, which the club will wear during their campaigns in the Jupiler Pro League and the Europa League.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement touted for Anderlecht job because of Rangers 'modern, attacking football'
arts.sum: Philippe Clement has been touted for the Anderlecht job because of his "modern, attacking football" at Rangers. Get the latest news sent straight to your messages by joining our Rangers WhatsApp community today.
